ctrlproxy:module.name: nickserv

description.para: This module takes care of registration with NickServ and ghosting older connections.

ctrlproxy:module.example:
<ctrlproxy> <plugins> <plugin autoload="1" file="nickserv"/> <plugin autoload="1" file="socket"/> </plugins>
<networks> <network name="OFTC"> <servers><ipv4 host="irc.oftc.net"/></servers> <channel name="#flood.nl" autojoin="1"/> <nickserv> <nick name="foo" password="secret"/> </nickserv> </network> </networks> </ctrlproxy>
